Package soap.local.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IDataObjectAPI
    Deprecated interface. There is no replacement. Instead, you should write your own Gosu class and publish it as a web service by marking it with the @RpcWebService annotation.

    Methods in this class use XPath. The notation draws heavily from the new "Service Data Object" spec from BEA and IBM. See their Service Data Ojbects specification. Please note that certain characters need to be escaped in XPath notation. Specifically: ' goes to '
    " goes to &qout;
    < goes to <
    > goes to >
    & goes to &
    @author mshaw @version Jan 16, 2004 4:15:21 PM @deprecated Write your own Gosu class and publish it as a web service.
    IGroupAPI
    IGroupAPI provides mechanisms for adding new Groups to and obtaining information for existing Groups from ClaimCenter
    IImportToolsAPI
    IImportToolsAPI is a remote interface to a set of tools to import XML data to the server.

    The XML import format is defined by dynamically-generated XML Schema Definition (XSD) files. Regenerate the XSD files with the regen-xsd task. After XSD regeneration, you will find the XSD files in dist/xsd/import, including the three XSD files: xx_typelists.xsd, xx_entities.xsd, xx_import.xsd (with "xx" replaced by the Guidewire product code, e.g., "cc" for ClaimCenter).
    ILoginAPI
    A remote interface that allows a user to log in and out of a system. The system uses conversations to implement SOAP authentication in a Guidewire application (e.g. BillingCenter, ClaimCenter, PolicyCenter). When connecting to Guidewire applications the caller must first authenticate using the ILoginAPI.login() method. This method returns the the session ID of the server session. On each successive call in the conversation, pass the session ID in the SOAP header {@link gw.pl.util.webservices.Globals#GW_AUTHENTICATION_SECURITY_TOKEN_CONTEXT_PROPERTY}. You must call logout() when you are done with the conversation. NOTE: This API is intended for users who are using Guidewire's web services from languages other than Java. If you are using Java, you should use the APILocator instead.
    IMaintenanceToolsAPI
    An API used for managing the application. This is distinct from ISystemToolsAPI which is concerned with managing the application platform. @deprecated Since 8.0.0. Please use the ab800 package.
    IMessagingToolsAPI
    MessagingTools is a remote interface to a set of tools to get messaging statistics and perform operations on messages. @deprecated Since 8.0.0. Please use the ab800 package.
    IProfilerAPI
    API to access services offered by the Guidewire Profiler.
    IReviewSummaryAPI
    IReviewSummaryAPI provides methods for creating and deleting review summaries corresponding to contact Reviews on ClaimCenter. @deprecated Since 8.0.0. Please use the ABVendorEvaluationAPI
    ISystemToolsAPI
    System maintenance interface.
    ITableImportAPI
    This interface provides methods for integrity checking and loading data via the staging tables.

    In particular, it allows the caller to instruct the server to perform the following staging table operations: Clear error table. Clear exclusion table. Clear staging tables. Delete rows from staging tables based on contents of exclusion table. Populate exclusion table with rows to be excluded. Integrity check the contents of the staging tables. Integrity check the contents of the Zone staging tables and load Zone source tables if no errors. Integrity check the contents of the staging tables and load source tables if no errors.

    ITypelistToolsAPI
    ITypelistToolsAPI provides methods that allow for the extraction of typelist data from the system.
    IUserAPI
    UserAPI is used to perform operations on users. This includes creating and modifying.
    IWorkflowAPI
    External API for performing operations on workflows.
    IZoneImportAPI
    IZoneImportAPI is a remote interface to a set of tools to import zone data (in csv format) into the staging tables. See documentation for the zone data csv format.
